languages: Understands the Languages it's owner speaks
name: Iron Defender (Artificer)

actions.description: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The magical mechanisms inside the iron defender restore 2d8 + 2 hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.
actions.name: Repair (3/Day)

actions.description: The Iron defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack rolls against a creature other than the iron defender.
actions.name: Reaction: Defensive Pounce

specialTraits.description: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the iron defender's skill bonuses, the bonuses to hit and damage of its bite, and the number of hit points restored by its Repair action
specialTraits.name: Might of the Master

specialTraits.description: The Iron Defender can't be surprised
specialTraits.name: Vigilant

specialTraits.description: All actions require your bonus action
specialTraits.name: Obedient
